overview: A focus hip-hop dancer who was the best at his craft, refuse to ever dance again without his girlfriend Kerry. When Alvin Taylor lost his one and only true love Kerry in a car crash, he went through a great deal of pain. Alvin begin drawing and his art became a tattoo in his life. The tattoo helped him realize his true passion for dance.
tagline: What is the value of love?
title: The Tattoo of Life
